name: Down>Beat
description:
Made for the Curdle Game Jam 5:
"Beat Around The Bush"

A musician's sheet music flies out the window, lost into the sky, and now he must return to the rooftops to collect them, so he can sing to his plant and allow it to grow again, but something is off, and the Truth seems to be floating further and further out of reach.

Featuring:

  • 4 short levels - can be completed in 2 minutes
  • Decent-ish platforming
  • 3 endings
  • Full voice acting
  • 1-bit graphics (except the loading screen)
